p: According to the updated information in National Health Commission of China, by January 30, 2020, a total of 9692 confirmed patients and 15,238 suspected patients have been reported around 31 provinces and cities in China. Among the confirmed patients, 1527 are severe patients, 171 have recovered and been discharged home, and 213 died. Twenty-eight pediatricÂ patients have been reported [ 1].
